description.value: Flames and explosions sear the air in a riot of color and devastation that rivals that wrought by even the wildest goblin party. The display is both so beautiful and chaotic that, while mesmerizing, it poses a significant risk to the physical health, sight, and hearing of anyone who gets too close. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Goblin Jubilee] fireworks display.
